explanation: [0-0] A metal baking tray filled with partially cooked egg breads, with several molds empty. Next, the mold is opened, revealing a row of gas burners underneath the grill, then a hand wearing a blue glove appears from the left side of the frame, igniting the burners, with a row of flames emerging from above. The area below the burner is covered with yellow crumbs.

[0-5] The shot cuts to a left hand holding a black pointed tube, squeezing batter into the molds one by one, the batter not enough to fill the entire mold. Then the mold is lifted, so that the batter evenly fills the bottom of the mold.
